summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and Timothy Shea regarding a response to a U.S. Senate inquiry about the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. Berman proposes a standard response stating the SDNY investigation remains ongoing.

events.title: U.S. Attorney Statement on Epstein Investigation
events.description: The U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York publicly stated the investigation into Epstein's conduct remains ongoing.

keyFacts: The email discusses a response to a U.S. Senate inquiry (from Senator Ben Sasse) regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The standard guidance from the Office of Legal Affairs (OLA) is to either not respond to Congressional requests or to provide only publicly available information.
The proposed response confirms the SDNY investigation into Epstein, including a conspiracy count, was 'ongoing' as of August 10-11, 2019.
The correspondence shows internal DOJ coordination on handling political oversight of the sensitive Epstein investigation.
